Read YAML Sample Data and Metrics

Source: R/readYAML.R
readYAML.Rd

Read YAML Sample Data and Metrics

readYAMLSampleData(file)

readYAMLSampleMetrics(file)

Arguments

file

string. File path to bcbio project-summary.yaml.

Value

DataFrame.

Note

Metrics are only generated for a standard RNA-seq run with aligned counts. Fast RNA-seq mode with lightweight counts (pseudocounts) doesn't output the same metrics into the YAML.

See also

Other Read Functions: readDataVersions, readLog, readProgramVersions, readSampleData, readTx2gene

Examples

file <- "http://bcbiobase.seq.cloud/project-summary.yaml"

# Sample metadata
x <- readYAMLSampleData(file)
#> Reading sample metadata from YAML
#> Reading project-summary.yaml
glimpse(x)
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 4
#>   ..@ listData       :List of 5
#>   .. ..$ sampleName : Factor w/ 4 levels "group1_1","group1_2",..: 1 2 3 4
#>   .. ..$ description: Factor w/ 4 levels "group1_1","group1_2",..: 1 2 3 4
#>   .. ..$ genomeBuild: Factor w/ 1 level "mm10": 1 1 1 1
#>   .. ..$ group      : Factor w/ 2 levels "ctrl","ko": 1 1 2 2
#>   .. ..$ samRef     : Factor w/ 1 level "/groups/bcbio/bcbio_dev/genomes/Mmusculus/mm10/seq/mm10.fa": 1 1 1 1
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()

# Sample metrics
x <- readYAMLSampleMetrics(file)
#> Reading sample metrics from YAML
#> Reading project-summary.yaml
glimpse(x)
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 4
#>   ..@ listData       :List of 16
#>   .. ..$ averageInsertSize            : num [1:4] 0 0 0 0
#>   .. ..$ duplicates                   : num [1:4] 0 0 0 0
#>   .. ..$ duplicationRateOfMapped      : num [1:4] 0.557 0.589 0.577 0.583
#>   .. ..$ exonicRate                   : num [1:4] 0.859 0.882 0.863 0.871
#>   .. ..$ intergenicRate               : num [1:4] 0.0663 0.0599 0.0661 0.0635
#>   .. ..$ intronicRate                 : num [1:4] 0.0747 0.0581 0.0707 0.0652
#>   .. ..$ mappedPairedReads            : num [1:4] 0 0 0 0
#>   .. ..$ mappedReads                  : num [1:4] 22062337 25852621 25172084 25100941
#>   .. ..$ percentGC                    : num [1:4] 48 48 47 48
#>   .. ..$ qualityFormat                : Factor w/ 1 level "standard": 1 1 1 1
#>   .. ..$ rrna                         : num [1:4] 42219 48275 38894 40832
#>   .. ..$ rrnaRate                     : num [1:4] 0.00207 0.00197 0.00167 0.00174
#>   .. ..$ sequenceLength               : Factor w/ 1 level "25-75": 1 1 1 1
#>   .. ..$ sequencesFlaggedAsPoorQuality: num [1:4] 0 0 0 0
#>   .. ..$ totalReads                   : num [1:4] 22339941 26168288 25490090 25399483
#>   .. ..$ x5x3Bias                     : num [1:4] 1.01 1.04 1 0.98
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()
